name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice. Place cheese between the unbuttered sides. Heat a pan over medium heat and grill the sandwich until golden brown on both sides and the cheese is melted.

name: Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente (about 8-10 minutes). Drain and return to the pot. Add tomato sauce and a drizzle of olive oil. Heat through for 2-3 minutes over medium heat.

name: PB&J Sandwich
instructions: Spread peanut butter on one slice of bread and jelly on the other. Press slices together to form a sandwich. Cut diagonally if desired.

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with milk until smooth. Heat a nonstick pan over medium heat, pour in eggs, and cook until edges start to set. Sprinkle cheese, fold the omelette, and cook 1-2 more minutes until fully set.

name: Naan Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 425째F (220째C). Spread tomato sauce evenly on naan, sprinkle cheese on top, and bake for 10 minutes or until cheese melts and edges are crisp.

name: Fried Rice
instructions: Cook rice and let cool. Heat 1 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat. Scramble eggs and set aside. Add rice to the pan, stir-fry 2-3 minutes, add soy sauce and cooked eggs, stir to combine.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast bread slices. Mash avocado with a fork and spread on toast. Sprinkle a pinch of salt and optional pepper or chili flakes.

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Add banana, strawberries, and milk to a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a glass and serve chilled.

name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Whisk eggs and milk together. Melt butter in a pan over medium-low heat. Pour in egg mixture and gently stir until cooked softly. Serve immediately.

name: Salad Bowl
instructions: Wash and chop lettuce and tomatoes. Toss in a bowl with olive oil, salt, and pepper to taste. Serve fresh.

name: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions (8-10 minutes). While hot, mix with beaten eggs, grated cheese, and butter, stirring quickly to make a creamy sauce without scrambling the eggs.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce, toast cubed bread for croutons. Toss lettuce with croutons, grated cheese, and Caesar dressing. Serve immediately.

name: Banana Smoothie
instructions: Combine banana, milk, and strawberries in a blender. Blend until smooth and creamy. Serve with ice if desired.
